cs.DC, cs.Distributed Systems, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.PL 

The paper discusses a platform for scaling out MapReduce computations to multiple clouds and tolerating various types of faults, which falls under the categories of distributed systems and cloud computing. The paper also discusses fault tolerance and security, which could fall under the categories of computer security and software engineering. Finally, the paper proposes a solution that does not require modification to the widely used Hadoop framework, which could fall under the category of programming languages.
